attributes.action: Ignore calls for smokers to pay extra for healthcare
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although I  myself am not a smoker, I can sympathise with those who struggle continuously to beat this immense addiction. It has been proven by American scientists that nicotine is as difficult to give up as cocaine, in terms of the severity of withdrawal symptoms, and the length for which they persist. I therefore find it ignorant of people to suggest that giving up smoking is easy.
